attributes.action: Make sign language an essential lesson for children to learn in schools
attributes.additional_details:
Help save the silence by allowing the future which is our children to learn sign language. Friendship and communication is a beautiful thing. Lets open more opportunities for people in the future to achieve their dreams.
Approximately 9 million people in the UK have hearing loss. Around 1 in every 1000 children is born with a severe or profound hearing loss. 90% of all deaf children are born to hearing parents. 1/3 people between the ages 65-75 will suffer from hearing loss. Save the silence.
attributes.background: Help the future be more inclusive by making sign language an essential lesson to learn in public and private schools across the UK. What a wonderful and beautiful world that will be where people hard of hearing can feel more connected to the world. Lets create more opportunities in the future.
